Primary Contact: Colleen Cornock, Crime Prevention Supervisor, Kelowna RCMP; Email: colleen.cornock@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
Service Details: - Operates a partnership between police and citizens that draws on members of the community for help in preventing and reducing neighbourhood crime- In this neighbour-helping-neighbour program, citizens learn to secure their property, be aware of their surroundings, and report any suspicious activities to police- For information on developing a Block Watch program in your neighbourhood, contact your local Community Police Office
Address & Map: 1450 KLO Rd, #100Kelowna, BC     V1W 3Z4View MapQuest Map
